file_content.text: Nicely done! You rescued all of our pilots. I hope you made those coward snipers pay while you were at it.
I did.
Hah! Just what I like to hear.
I was happy to help.
Is there more?
I don't have anything else to ask of you. Pilots are safe, mission's complete.
Thanks again for your assistance.
There's not much time. The resistance may execute those pilots any time now.
Damned snipers! Come out here and fight like men!
Hah! Missed me, you cowards!
Oh! Pardon, my lord, didn't see you there. Uh, could I beg a moment of your time? Our mission would greatly benefit from your assistance.
Tell me what sort of help you need.
What do you ask of me?
My skills could be turned in many directions. Why should I turn them in yours?
I'm sure that's true.
Who the--oh, sir, I didn't recognize you. Could I convince you to stay a moment? Your expertise would be very helpful to my mission.
I'm the only one here worth your time, soldier. Address me only.
You should speak to me.
I would expect a soldier to notice the people around him more quickly.
You should pay more attention.
I could help out for the right price.
Depends--are you paying?
Well, when it comes to getting our comrades out of enemy hands, I'll give anything.
Tell me how I can aid your operation, Lieutenant.
Very well.
Excuse me, who are you? If you're in my trench, you'd better be here to help.
Ignore that one--hired help, nothing more.
You should speak to me.
I go where I please.
Mind your tone.
My lord! You have my apologies, I didn't see you there.
I only help people I like and people who pay. So far, you're neither.
Watch that attitude.
That's a situation I can remedy.
Tell us what you need, and we'll see what can be done.
We all have our duties.
My apologies, agent. I didn't recognize you.
Tell me about the problem.
I'm not here to help you.
Please, hear me out. The lives of Imperial servicemen depend on it.
One of our fighter squadrons was patrolling this sector when they were shot down by resistance fighters. The pilots who survived were all captured.
They are being held in that camp up ahead--the snipers guarding them are exceptional. Simply reaching this position cost me eight men.
My unit needs reinforcements to complete this mission, but that'll take time--time those pilots don't have.
We're out of options. At this point, only someone with your skills could rescue those pilots in time. Can you assist us?
I won't let the resistance kill those pilots.
I'll do it.
Your help is greatly appreciated. Good luck.
We'll see.
Any help at all would be greatly appreciated. Thank you.
This is your mission, not mine. You're on your own.
Do it yourself. [Refuse quest]
Very well, then. Farewell.
Keep your head down! The resistance has sharpshooters everywhere.
